body: At 3rd level, the world walker gains the ranger's favored terrain ability. She treats her druid level as her ranger level for this ability. If she has levels in both classes, both class's levels stack for determining the effect of this ability. This ability replaces trackless step and reduce nature's lore.
name: Favored Terrain
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/World Walker/Favored Terrain
